author: sasharma6
body:
Problem :- SMP DQM validation (which at the moment is broken) i.e. Empty Plots
in SMP PPD DQM codes (Electron & Muon DQM) in MiniAOD framework.

Solution implemented:-  wrote an analyzer and run manually on the relval samples () to perform validation. Codes are made independent to Trigger and checked.

Things to do: To approve the code and check whether it is properly merged"
title: DQM for SMP PAG status
